rule.name: CASE_APP_CastProductXML
rule.description: Casts a item in the product xml constant to a product data type
rule.definition:
=cast(typeof('type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_Product'()),
{
name: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//product/name/text()"),
sku: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//sku/text()"),
description: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//shortDescription/text()"),
category: 1,
productCategory: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//category/name/text()")[3],
manufacturer: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//manufacturer/text()"),
modelNumber: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//modelNumber/text()"),
releaseDate: todate(now()-(100+tointeger(rand()*2000))),
isActive: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//active/text()"),
price: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//regularPrice/text()"),
quantity: 10 + tointeger(rand()*400),
productImageDocId: #"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4434"[ri!index], shippingDetails:
{
weight: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//weight/text()"),
height: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//height/text()"),
width: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//width/text()"),
depth: xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//depth/text()")
},
webImageID: append( xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//image/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//largeImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//largeFrontImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//alternateViewsImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//backViewImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//angleImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//energyGuideImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//leftViewImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//mediumImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//remoteControlImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//rightViewImage/text()"), xpathsnippet(#"_a-0000d9c4-bcac-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_4435"[ri!index], "//topViewImage/text()") )
} )
